Team

Who we are

On this page you can list team members by defining them in _data/team.yml.

Philip J. Fry | Delivery boy

Protagonist, from the 20th century. Many times great-uncle to Professor Hubert Farnsworth.

Turanga Leela | Captain

Mutant cyclops. Leela is spaceship captain, pilot, and head of all aviation services on board the Planet Express Ship.

Professor Hubert J. Farnsworth | CEO & Owner

Many times great-nephew of Fry. Tenured professor of Mars University.

  • Name of project partner 1
  • Prestigious and long name of project partner 2
